title: Vinmeen Lyrics Thegidi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Vinmeen
Singer: Abhay Jodhpurkar, Saindhavi Prakash
Lyricist: Kabilan
Movie: Thegidi (2014)
Music: Nivas K Prasanna

Vinmeen vidhayil nilavaai mulaithen
penmeen vizhiyil enaye tholaithen.
mazhayin isai kaettu 
marale thalaiyaattu.
malalai mozhi pola
manadhil oru paattu.
ini neeyum naanum ondraai 
serndhal kadhal irandu ezhuthu. (2)

Vinmeen vidhayil nilavaai mulaithen
penmeen vizhiyil enaye tholaithen.

Naan pesaadha mounam ellaam
uun kangal pesum.
Unnai kaanaadha neram ennai
kedikaaram ketkum.
Madal medhu thoorum mazhai polave
manadhodu neethaan nulaindhayadi

Mudhal penthaaney neethaaney
ennakullaara aerppeney.
ini neeyum naanum ondraai 
serndhal kadhal irandu ezhuthu.

Oru pennaaga unmel naaney
peraasai kondaen.
unnai munnaaley paarkkum podhu
pesaamal nindren.

Edharkkaaga unnai edhirpaarkkiren
enakkulle naanum dhinam ketkiren
inimel naaney neeyaanen.
ivan pinnaale poveney

ini neeyum naanum ondraai 
serndhal kadhal irandu ezhuthu.

Vinmeen vidhayil nilavaai mulaithen
penmeen vizhiyil enaye tholaithen.
mazhayin isai kaettu 
marale thalaiyaattu.
malalai mozhi pola
manadhil oru paattu.
ini neeyum naanum ondraai 
serndhal kadhal irandu ezhuthu.
